$\definecolor{brightyellow} {RGB}{222,255,0}$
$\definecolor{brightred}    {RGB}{255,0,188}$
$\definecolor{brightgreen}  {RGB}{3,255,0}$
$\definecolor{brightblue}   {RGB}{0,205,255}$
$\definecolor{brightpurple} {RGB}{133,0,255}$

$\renewcommand{\redbox}[1]     {\fcolorbox{black}{brightred}{#1}}$
$\renewcommand{\greenbox}[1]   {\fcolorbox{black}{brightgreen}{#1}}$
$\renewcommand{\bluebox}[1]    {\fcolorbox{black}{brightblue}{#1}}$
$\renewcommand{\yellowbox}[1]  {\fcolorbox{black}{brightyellow}{#1}}$
$\renewcommand{\purplebox}[1]  {\fcolorbox{black}{brightpurple}{#1}}$
